channel.title: Need help with client
channel.description:
Need help trying to load the client :palm: Source: deathlypvpz-v4-pi :confused:
I'm trying to load the client but it says error connecting to server? Please could really use some help , ATM it's stuck on "requesting title screen"
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/209nm94.png[/img]
The run from source works but not sure if the compiler from the source works but heres the pic
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/24177sg.png[/img]
The long writing "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d Data/CompiledFiles source\server\model\items\*.java source\server\model\minigames\*.java source\server\model\npcs\*.java source\server\model\objects\*.java source\server\model\players\*.java source\server\model\players\skills\*.java source\server\model\players\packets\*.java source\server\model\shops\*.java source\server\net\*.java source\server\task\*.java source\server\util\*.java source\server\world\*.java source\server\util\log\*.java source\server\*.java source\server\clip\*.java source\server\world\map\*.java source\server\clip\region\*.java source\server\model\players\Content\*.java pause "
Here is the Java stuff :
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/125kuvn.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/1qil1g.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/t8khoj.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/1z1ea77.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/qoyuqe.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/adguph.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/25zm7i1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/34dj149.png[/img]
Thanks Dom

item.title: Need help with client
item.dc:creator: @Pk-Xile Pk-Xile
item.description:
@Pk-Xile wrote:

Need help trying to load the client :palm: Source: deathlypvpz-v4-pi

I’m trying to load the client but it says error connecting to server? Please could really use some help , ATM it’s stuck on “requesting title screen”

209nm94.png1023×557

The run from source works but not sure if the compiler from the source works but heres the pic

24177sg.png1023×539

The long writing
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\javac.exe” -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d Data/CompiledFiles source\server\model\items*.java source\server\model\minigames*.java source\server\model\npcs*.java source\server\model\objects*.java source\server\model\players*.java source\server\model\players\skills*.java source\server\model\players\packets*.java source\server\model\shops*.java source\server\net*.java source\server\task*.java source\server\util*.java source\server\world*.java source\server\util\log*.java source\server*.java source\server\clip*.java source\server\world\map*.java source\server\clip\region*.java source\server\model\players\Content*.java
pause "

Here is the Java stuff :
